0:
mqtt:
  host: emqx
  topic_prefix: frigate
  user: ${SECRET_FRIGATE_MQTT_USER}
  password: ${SECRET_FRIGATE_MQTT_PASSWORD}
database:
  path: /data/frigate.db
detectors:
  coral:
    type: edgetpu
    device: pci
objects:
  track:
  - person
  - dog
  filters:
    person:
      min_area: 2500
      max_area: 100000
      threshold: 0.7
    dog:
      min_area: 1000
      max_area: 10000
      threshold: 0.7
ffmpeg:
  hwaccel_args:
  - -hwaccel
  - vaapi
  - -hwaccel_device
  - /dev/dri/renderD128
  - -hwaccel_output_format
  - yuv420p
  # Enable audio on recordings...
  # might cause issues on recording playback
  output_args:
    record: -f segment -segment_time 10 -segment_format mp4 -reset_timestamps 1 -strftime 1 -c:v copy -c:a aac
cameras:
  # --
  doorbell:
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      # Sub Stream
      # - path: rtsp://admin:${SECRET_DOORBELL_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_DOORBELL_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/102
      #   roles:
      #   - detect
      # Main Stream
      - path: rtsp://admin:${SECRET_DOORBELL_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_DOORBELL_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/101
        roles:
        - rtmp
        - detect
        - record
    detect:
      width: 720
      height: 576
      fps: 15
    record:
      enabled: True
      retain:
        days: 0
        mode: active_objects
      events:
        retain:
          default: 14
        objects:
          - person
          - dog
          - cat
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      timestamp: False
      retain:
        default: 14
    rtmp:
      enabled: True
    
  front_door:
    # rtmp:
    #   enabled: false
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      # Main Stream
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/101
        roles:
        # - rtmp
        # - detect
        - record
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_FRONT_DOOR_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/102
        roles:
        - rtmp
        - detect
        # - record
        # - clips
    detect:
      width: 640
      height: 480
      fps: 15
    record:
      enabled: True
      retain:
        days: 0
        mode: active_objects
      events:
        retain:
          default: 14
        objects:
          - person
          - dog
          - cat
          - car
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      timestamp: False
      retain:
        default: 14
    # rtmp:
    #   enabled: True

  garage:
    rtmp:
      enabled: false
    ffmpeg:
      inputs:
      # Main Stream
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_GARAGE_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_GARAGE_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/101
        roles:
        # - rtmp
        # - detect
        - record
      - path: rtsp://frig:${SECRET_GARAGE_VIEWER_PASSWORD}@${SECRET_GARAGE_IP_ADDRESS}:554/Streaming/Channels/102
        roles:
        - rtmp
        - detect
        # - record
        # - clips
    detect:
      width: 640
      height: 480
      fps: 30
    record:
      enabled: True
      retain:
        days: 0
        mode: active_objects
      events:
        retain:
          default: 14
        objects:
          - person
          - dog
          - cat
          - car
    snapshots:
      enabled: True
      timestamp: False
      retain:
        default: 14
    # rtmp:
    #   enabled: True

mariadb-dump -h go-discord-archiver-db --password="$(MARIADB_PROD_ROOT_PASSWORD)" go_archiver > /backup/dump.sql && \
while [[ $(mariadb -uroot --password="$${MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD}" "$${MARIADB_DATABASE}" < /backup/dump.sql; echo $?) != 0 ]]; do
  sleep 1
done &
exec docker-entrypoint.sh mariadbd
{{ if eq .Status "resolved" }}{{ end }} {{ if eq .Status "firing" }}{{ end }} {{ index .CommonLabels.alertname }}

- job_name: "syno"
  static_configs:
  - targets: ["syno:9100"]
- job_name: "pinewall"
  static_configs:
  - targets: ["pinewall:9100"]
